title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
full_text: Looking for any wireless ear buds with a battery life longer than 9 hours on a single charge. I'm not too concerned about price, sound quality (to an extent) and other features like ANC, although I do prefer earbuds with ear hooks so they don't fall out but its not a deal breaker for me.

title: Shop Wireless Earbuds with Long Battery Life
summary: Get 20+ hours of listening with long battery life earbuds from Skullcandy. They’re the perfect choice for the active listener on the go. Shop today.
full_text: It’s easy to forget to charge your earbuds. That’s why it’s so important to have earbuds with long battery life. At Skullcandy, we prioritize battery life in all of our earbuds, ensuring that you’ll have plenty of battery to get you through the day. We carry some of the longest battery life earbuds in the industry, with up to 58 total hours of battery.
